name: Where Wolf? (Gugames.eu, Stickgrinder, drbb)
description:
As you were looking for your werewolf brothers, who mysteriously disappeared one after the other, you fall into a trap and find yourself locked in a dungeon.

Why did evil Bishop Hawks capture you all? What's his plan? Will you be able to escape and stop him?

But beware... the convent is full of nuns.

This is a point and click game. Use your mouse to control the character.

Left click: walk to, or interact with hotspot
Right click: look at hotspot
Inventory: left click to use, right click to look. Right click with a selected object will deselect it.

Note: subtitles will auto-advance by default. If you wish for the text to wait for your input, access the settings from the tab in the top right corner of the screen and check the corresponding option in the menu.

Made in 14 days for Adventure Jam 2022

Fabio "Guga" Guggeri
Writing, design, programming, character art, background art, music.
Paolo Pustorino
Design, background art, music.
Dario Rudoni
Additional jokes, maintenance, SFX.
